events.message: Applicant has submitted the personal loan application seeking funds for medical expenses related to recent surgery.
The loan application has been categorized under Personal Loan based on keywords indicating medical expense funding.
Loan officer Emily Chen assigned to handle the application and assist the applicant throughout the process.
Initial review completed indicating applicant meets basic eligibility criteria for a personal loan focused on medical expenses.
Requested medical bills, identity proof, and recent pay slips to proceed with verification and credit checks.
Applicant has submitted all requested documents including medical invoices and employment verification.
Credit check completed with a satisfactory score, showing stable credit history and no defaults.
Risk assessment completed identifying low to moderate risk for approving personal loan for medical reasons.
Loan offer of $15,000 presented to applicant with a competitive interest rate and flexible repayment terms.
Applicant expressed satisfaction with the loan offer and requested detailed repayment schedule.
Application escalated to senior manager for final approval due to loan amount exceeding initial threshold.
Senior management has approved the loan application after confirming all criteria and applicant financial stability.
Loan amount of $15,000 has been successfully disbursed to the applicantâ€™s bank account for medical treatment use.
Follow-up call made to ensure applicant understands repayment schedule and to assist with any queries.
The loan application process has been successfully completed and case closed with all documentation archived.
